content: if you re looking for a fun creative way to bring the beloved spam musubi to life in crochet form you re in the right place this crochet spam musubi pattern is the perfect addition to any food playset offering a cute and playful twist on the classic sushi-inspired snack **materials** ▢caron one pound - white ▢caron one pound - black ▢caron one pound - terracotta ▢5 mm hook ▢6 or 8mm safety eyes ▢polyfill ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** chains - chain single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase decrease - decrease
